Maps

Used in the design of applications to accompany pages where the location address is a main data component of the page. Maps are used to visually indicate the position of a location for users, ensuring the exact location.

The style applied to the map can be found on snazzymaps.com.

Simple Map

                                <div class="cmx-map">
    <div class="cmx-map__container" id="map"></div>
</div>

Map with Bottom Ribbon

Plant Location
Delivery Address Location
                                <div class="cmx-map">
    <div class="cmx-map__container" id="map2"></div>
    <div class="cmx-map__overlay map__overlay--bottom">
        <dl class="cmx-map__legend">
            <div class="cmx-map__legend-item">
                <dt class="cmx-map__legend-dot bg__bright-blue"></dt>
                <dd class="cmx-map__legend-label">Plant Location</dd>
            </div>
            <div class="cmx-map__legend-item">
                <dt class="cmx-map__legend-dot bg__bright-green"></dt>
                <dd class="cmx-map__legend-label">Delivery Address Location</dd>
            </div>
        </dl>
    </div>
</div>

Map with Side Pannel

                                <div class="cmx-map">
    <div class="cmx-map__container" id="map3"></div>
    <div class="cmx-map__overlay cmx-map__overlay--left">
        <div class="cmx-map__input-group">
            <label for="latitude">Latitude:</label>
            <input id="latitude" type="text" name="" value="25.686614" readonly />
        </div>
        <div class="cmx-map__input-group">
            <label for="longitude">Longitude:</label>
            <input id="longitude" type="text" name="" value="-100.316113" readonly />
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

... and the code required for all instances

.cmx-map{
    min-height: 200px;
    position: relative;
    &__container{
        position: absolute;
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
    }
    &__overlay {
        background: rgba(0,0,0,0.7);
        position: absolute; 
        z-index: 99;

        &--bottom{
            width  : 100%;
            height : 32px;
            bottom: 0px;
            padding:0.625rem;
        }

        &--left{
            top:0;
            width: 284px;
            height: 100%;
            padding: 7rem 1rem;
        }

        
    }
    &__legend{
        line-height: 12px;
        &-item{
            display:inline-flex;
            margin-right:1rem;
            &:last-of-type{
                margin-right: 0;
            }
        }
        &-label{
            font-size: $font-size-10;
            line-height: $line-height-14;
            color: $true-white;
        }
        &-dot{
            width: 12px;
            height: 12px;
            display: inline-block;
            border-radius: 50%;
            margin-right: 0.5rem;
        }
    }
    &__input-group {
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        
        label {
            display: inline-block;
            width: 100%;
            color: $gray-lightish;
            font-size: $font-size-12;
            line-height: $line-height-12;
        }

        input[type="text"] {
            background: none;
            color: $gray-lightish;
            width: 100%;
            border: 0 none;
            border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-lightish;
            font-size: $font-size-18;
            line-height: $line-height-20;
            font-weight: $font-light;
            padding-bottom: 0.375rem;
        }
    }
}
.cmx-map {
    min-height: 200px;
    position: relative;
}

.cmx-map__container {
    position: absolute;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
}

.cmx-map__overlay {
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 99;
}

.cmx-map__overlay--bottom {
    width: 100%;
    height: 32px;
    bottom: 0px;
    padding: 0.625rem;
}

.cmx-map__overlay--left {
    top: 0;
    width: 284px;
    height: 100%;
    padding: 7rem 1rem;
}

.cmx-map__legend {
    line-height: 12px;
}

.cmx-map__legend-item {
    display: -webkit-inline-box;
    display: -ms-inline-flexbox;
    display: inline-flex;
    margin-right: 1rem;
}

.cmx-map__legend-item:last-of-type {
    margin-right: 0;
}

.cmx-map__legend-label {
    font-size: 0.625rem;
    line-height: 0.875rem;
    color: #FFF;
}

.cmx-map__legend-dot {
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
    display: inline-block;
    border-radius: 50%;
    margin-right: 0.5rem;
}

.cmx-map__input-group {
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.cmx-map__input-group label {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 100%;
    color: #B0B0B0;
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    line-height: 0.75rem;
}

.cmx-map__input-group input[type="text"] {
    background: none;
    color: #B0B0B0;
    width: 100%;
    border: 0 none;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #B0B0B0;
    font-size: 1.125rem;
    line-height: 1.25rem;
    font-weight: 300;
    padding-bottom: 0.375rem;
}
<script>

// we append the 'loadMaps' to window so to guarantee it is a global variable
// the loadMaps portion is the one to specify in the callback parameter of the maps API call.

window.loadMaps = function(){

    // Find the DOM element where the map is going to be inserted.
    // We find it here with getElementById, but it can be any DOM element reference.
    
    // You could specify the target of an event instead or find the element with querySelector.

    var wrappingElementId = 'map1'; // write the id of the destination element
    
    var wrappingElement = document.getElementById(wrappingElementId); // the wrapping DOM element
    
    
    var map3 = new google.maps.Map(wrappingElement, {
        
        center: {
            lat: 25.686614,
            lng: -100.316113
            //to get the latitude and longitude use: http://www.latlong.net/
        },

        zoom: 12,
        styles: [
            {
                "featureType": "administrative.country",
                "elementType": "geometry.fill",
                "stylers": [
                    {
                        "visibility": "on"
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "featureType": "administrative.province",
                "elementType": "geometry.fill",
                "stylers": [
                    {
                        "visibility": "on"
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "featureType": "administrative.province",
                "elementType": "labels.text",
                "stylers": [
                    {
                        "visibility": "on"
                    }
                ]
            }
        ], // snazzymaps.com

        zoomControl: true,
        mapTypeControl: false,
        scaleControl: false,
        streetViewControl: false,
        rotateControl: false,
        fullscreenControl: false,
        scrollwheel: false,
        draggable: true,
        zoomControlOptions: {
            position: google.maps.ControlPosition.TOP_RIGHT
        },

        mapTypeControlOptions: {
            position: google.maps.ControlPosition.TOP_CENTER
        }
    });

}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=YOUR_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY&callback=loadMaps"></script>
